Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces

Interface SpiService<Type>

All Known Subinterfaces:
FileSystemInterface, Localizer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileSystem, AbstractLocalizer, DebuggingLocalizer, DummyLocalizer, FileSystemInMemory, FileSystemLocalizer, FileSystemOnClassLoader, FileSystemOnFile, FileSystemOnFileSystem, FileSystemOnRMI, FileSystemOnXMLReadOnly, MutableJsonLocalizer, PropertiesLocalizer, PureLibLocalizer, SwingUIServerFactory, XMLLocalizer
public interface SpiService<Type>

This interface describes any SPI member. Every purelib SPI implementation must implements this interface (see META-INF/services for details)

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canServe​(java.net.URI resource)
    Does the SPI support the given resource URI
    Type newInstance​(java.net.URI resource)
    Get SPI instance to serve the given resource URI

  • Method Details

    • canServe

      boolean canServe​(java.net.URI resource) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Does the SPI support the given resource URI

      Parameters:
      resource - resource URI to check
      Returns:
      true if supports
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - on null resource URI

    • newInstance

      Type newInstance​(java.net.URI resource) throws EnvironmentException, java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Get SPI instance to serve the given resource URI

      Parameters:
      resource - resource URI to get instance for
      Returns:
      instance to serve the URI. Can't be null
      Throws:
      EnvironmentException - when instance can't be created for the given URI for any reason
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when requested URI is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when requested URI has wrong format or is not supported by the given SPI service
